ValidationRule.description: Need to force 4 digits entered in this field, including leading zero.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISBLANK(Cost_Center__c), !ISNUMBER(Cost_Center__c), LEN(Cost_Center__c) != 4 ), ($RecordType.Name = "PAC Warranty Record Type" ), (ISPICKVAL(Warranty_Charged_To__c,'Other')), ($Profile.Name <>"System Administrator") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must enter four numbers in the Cost Center field, when the Warrant Charged To value of "Other" is chosen. Leading zeroes are allowed.
